org.neo4j.kernel.lifecycle
Interface Lifecycle

All Known Implementing Classes:
DatabaseAvailability, KernelEventHandlers, KernelExtensions, LifecycleAdapter, LifeSupport, LuceneKernelExtension, StoreLockerLifecycleAdapter, TransactionEventHandlers
public interface Lifecycle

Lifecycle interface for kernel components. Init is called first, followed by start, and then any number of stop-start sequences, and finally stop and shutdown. As a stop-start cycle could be due to change of configuration, please perform anything that depends on config in start(). Implementations can throw any exception. Caller must handle this properly.
